contact.address: 200, rue du Faubourg Saint-Denis-75475 Paris cedex 10

abstract.title: TWELVE-MONTH INHALATION STUDY ON ROOM-AGED CIGARETTE SIDESTREAM SMOKE (RASS) IN RATS

study_details.exposure: Whole-body exposed to RASS at 6 and 12 g total particulate matter/l for 12 h/d, 5 d/week, 12 months
study_details.comparison: Head-only exposed at 12 g/l for 7 h/d

findings.nicotine_concentration: Reduced concentrations of nicotine, formaldehyde, and catechol
findings.urinary_analysis: Additional uptake by routes other than inhalation
findings.dna_damage: Slight increase in oxidative DNA damage in nasal respiratory epithelium
findings.histopathological_changes: Minimal to moderate reserve cell hyperplasia and squamous metaplasia
